alert.note: Alert for Livingston; Oakland (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 11 at 10:04PM EDT until August 11 at 11:45PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Michigan, including the following counties, Livingston and Oakland. * WHEN...Until 100 AM EDT. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1000 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Rainfall rates in excess of 2 inches per hour have been estimated by radar. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Troy, Pontiac, Hartland, Howell, Milford, Oxford, Fowlerville, Royal Oak, Birmingham, Rochester, West Bloomfield, Rochester Hills, Madison Heights, Auburn Hills, Wixom, Clawson, Walled Lake, Wolverine Lake, Bloomfield Hills and Lake Orion. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
